## isBoolean() function

检查值value是否为boolean类型

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isBoolean(value: unknown): value is boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is boolean

如果value等于Boolean类型,那么返回true,否则返回false
